questions.question: $$ \text{Initial guess: } x1 = 1 $$ $$ \text{constant_df} = df(x1) = 2.8145  $$ $$ x2 = x1 - \frac{f(x1)}{\text{constant_df}} $$ $$\text{equation } =  x^2 - cos(x) $$ $$ df(x) = 2 × x + sin(x) $$ $$\text{What is function value of 5th iteration using Modified Newton Raphson method?}$$

$$ \text{Initial guess: } x1 = 1 $$ $$ \text{constant_df} = df(x1) = 2.8145  $$ $$ x2 = x1 - \frac{f(x1)}{\text{constant_df}} $$ $$\text{equation } =  x^2 - cos(x) $$ $$ df(x) = 2 × x + sin(x) $$ $$\text{What is root value of 5th iteration using Modified Newton Raphson method?}$$
